title: Chairman Cheesecake, Neglected Foods 3.27.20
itunes:title: Chairman Cheesecake, Neglected Foods 3.27.20
description:
In episode 596, Jack and Miles are joined by quar-bae Jamie Loftus to discuss how Cheesecake Factory is refusing to pay their rent, a sharp drop in jobs in America, Joe Biden's accuser speaking out, how coronavirus is affecting crime rates, a Gwyneth Paltrow approved doctor pushing coronavirus conspiracies, grocery store foods people don't care to hoard, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Cheesecake Factory Tells Landlords Across the Country It Won’t Be Able to Pay Rent on April 1
  2. Working Age Population: Aged 15-64: All Persons for the United States
  3. U.S. Jobless Claims Skyrocket Amid Coronavirus Outbreak
  4. TRANSCRIPT of Joe Biden's accuser Tara Reade finally telling her full story. CW: Sexual Assault
  5. How will the coronavirus affect crime rates? It’s complicated, experts say
  6. Gwyneth Paltrow Models Contagion Chic and Good Farmers Market Behavior
  7. The Gwyneth Paltrow-Approved Doctor Pushing Wacky Coronavirus Conspiracies
  8. How We Can Learn to Tolerate Emotional Pain
  9. The five most ridiculous ideas from Goop's 'health' conference
  10. HIV DOESN'T CAUSE AIDS ACCORDING TO GWYNETH PALTROW GOOP 'TRUSTED EXPERT' DOCTOR KELLY BROGAN
  11. Desperate shoppers not desperate enough for odd foods on picked-over grocery shelves
  12. WATCH: Fela Kuti - Roforofo Fight (LP)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
